message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a product that I know will be incredibly valuable to you. I understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and I'm confident it can generate significant returns. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000. This price allows you to secure a valuable asset at a substantial discount, while still ensuring I receive a fair return.  Consider this a unique opportunity to gain a competitive edge. Let me know your thoughts!
